<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A address must be loaded from a small section if its size is less than the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// small section size threshold. Data in this section could be addressed by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// using gp&#95;rel operator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvelftargetobjectfile/#a8743fe5b835aee3bba64eeba2e18cca7"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvelftargetobjectfile/#a8743fe5b835aee3bba64eeba2e18cca7">RISCVELFTargetObjectFile::isInSmallSection</a>(uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// gcc has traditionally not treated zero-sized objects as small data, so this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is effectively part of the ABI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &lt;= SSThreshold;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return true if this global address should be placed into small data/bss</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// section.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvelftargetobjectfile/#a2adf1ff4e0a2e37ff5c9ebb3c68ea93e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/riscvelftargetobjectfile/#a2adf1ff4e0a2e37ff5c9ebb3c68ea93e">RISCVELFTargetObjectFile::isGlobalInSmallSection</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalobject">GlobalObject</a> &#42;GO, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetloweringobjectfile/#a4ef15b6d500629e31fb3787b7a0d7bb0">TM</a>)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only global variables, not functions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable">GlobalVariable</a> &#42;GVA = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;GlobalVariable&gt;</a>(GO);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!GVA)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the variable has an explicit section, it is placed in that section.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (GVA-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalobject/#ade7dc7510e950cd1c1181138b390f965">hasSection</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Section = GVA-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalobject/#a0b2e3fb45c4435c29abebf7768a77cd6">getSection</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Explicitly placing any variable in the small data section overrides</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the global -G value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Section == </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.sdata&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> || Section == </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.sbss&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise reject putting the variable to small section if it has an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// explicit section name.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (((GVA-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue/#a1847e956a0087fefdb49e2a9583c7d18">hasExternalLinkage</a>() &amp;&amp; GVA-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue/#a32e606ac4c88f71f14212e42b808e7f4">isDeclaration</a>()) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">       GVA-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue/#ac10ac4576e030b231e1fbb5a8272f01f">hasCommonLinkage</a>()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty = GVA-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue/#af1dd2acfc2950742e41a64a342b15c80">getValueType</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It is possible that the type of the global is unsized, i.e. a declaration</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of a extern struct. In this case don&#39;t presume it is in the small data</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Kind.isMergeableConst4())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SmallROData4Section;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Kind.isMergeableConst8())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SmallROData8Section;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Kind.isMergeableConst16())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SmallROData16Section;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Kind.isMergeableConst32())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SmallROData32Section;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LLVM only generate up to .rodata.cst32, and use .rodata section if more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// than 32 bytes, so just use .srodata here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SmallRODataSection;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, we work the same as ELF.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetloweringobjectfileelf/#a2ace703bfd969dcf5e8c86590226fb26">TargetLoweringObjectFileELF::getSectionForConstant</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, Kind, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                            Alignment);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
